SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Utils

Class GameStatusToFile

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.GameStatusToFile
public class GameStatusToFile extends Object
This class represents the game status to be saved to a file. It contains information about the current state of the game.
